page.title: 12A FAMILY
page.content: I WAKE AT 07.45,DRESS,BREAKFAST AND DEPART FOR SCHOOL ON THE 08.30 BUS.BY NOW MY DAD HAS HIS VEGETABLE SHOP OPEN FOR THE DAY.MY MUM STARTS WORK AS A HOME HELP AT 10.00.MY ELDEST BROTHER, MARRIED WITH TWO CHILDREN,WORKS FOR DAD.MY OTHER BROTHER IS EMPLOYED BY A BUILDING CONTRACTOR.MY THREE SISTERS, ALL OF WHOM ARE NOW MARRIED,WERE IN FULL-TIME EMPLOYMENT BEFORE MARRIAGE-- TWO AS NURSES AND ONE IN THE NEARBY NYLON FACTORY.ALL MY BROTHERS AND SISTERS,WITH THEIR FAMILIES,VISIT MUM, DAD AND ME REGULARLY.AFTER SCHOOL EACH EVENING I WORK IN THE FAMILY VEGETABLE BUSINESS.MY PARENTS USUALLY GO OUT FOR A RELAXING MEAL ON A SATURDAY NIGHT.
